author: larryi
msg: Update to set the result to true if test is skipped.
Also, implement "unless" on Matcher as a comma separated list of properties.
The matcher is executed only if all properties are not defined. This allows
a sequence of matchers to specify an "if" on different properties and
a default matcher to specify the list of properties in an "unless".

author: larryi
msg: Log a warning when modules.xml isn't found

author: larryi
msg: Specify autoFlush=true for the PrintWriter so the output doesn't just sit
in a buffer.  This logger is most likely to be used when a configuration
error prevents normal startup. In this case, autoflush ensures the log output

author: billbarker
msg: It is really great when you learn to read :)

I had totally misunderstood the java.net.URL javadocs, so this wasn't working at all.  This shouldn't effect any outstanding bugs (due to a weird combination of bugs in the previous version, that prevented this class from doing much of anything).  However, it will now hopefully work as advertised.
